mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_project.member_account ( USERNAME, PASSWORD, SALT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{create_by}, NOW(), #{update_by}, NOW() )
